name: Rummy and Coqui: Valenskink's Day!
description:
Hey, stoopkids (and soon-to-be stoopkids)! The long-awaited, much-anticipated Rummy and Coqui visual novel is finally going live! It's time to celebrate Valenskink's Day with your favorite no-good-dirty-rotten delinquents, Boss Rummy and Sub-Boss Coqui of the South Side Skinks! (Oh, and Krimbo's there, too - we thought it was only fair to warn ya.) Better make sure you take care of your gangly business, though, 'cause these ladies do NOT like to be disappointed!

We're offerin' this short-n'-sweet little number for BUTT-NOTHIN' as a way of thankin' our current stoopkids and hopefully bringin' in some new recruits... but, if you'd like to see more content like this from us, go ahead and give that donate button some love, why don't ya? Either way, make sure you're subbed to us on YouTube so you can come hang every week with the chillest VTubers on the South Side!

Game is fully voiced, with multiple endings to find. Strong language warning.
